name: website_url_qr_code
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool scanova_qr_code.
Tool description: Scanova QR Code API lets you generate custom-designed Branded QR Codes in bulk programmatically in your own mobile application or information system within few minutes.
API description: Generates a static QR code (standard or custom-designed) encoded with the specified URL and customization options using the Scanova QR Code API.

error_correction.description: Specifies error correction level. Default is 'H'.

eye_pattern.description: Specifies the eye pattern of the QR code. Default is 'RECT_RECT'.

data_gradient_style.description: Specifies the gradient style for the data modules. Default is 'None'.

format.description: Specifies the format of the QR code image. Default is 'png'.

size.description: Specifies the size of the QR code image. Default is 'm'.

eye_color_outer.description: Specifies the outer color of the eye modules. Default is '#000000'.

data_gradient_end_color.description: Specifies the end color of the gradient for data modules. Default is '#000000'.

data_gradient_start_color.description: Specifies the start color of the gradient for data modules. Default is '#000000'.

eye_color_inner.description: Specifies the inner color of the eye modules. Default is '#000000'.

url.description: The URL to be encoded in the QR code. Default is 'https://scanova.io'.

data_pattern.description: Specifies the data pattern of the QR code. Default is 'RECT'.

background_color.description: Specifies the background color of the QR code. Default is '#FFFFFF'.
